privacy_intro_content: This Privacy Policy describes how Killer Sudoku Score collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our web application.
privacy_collect_content: We collect minimal information necessary to provide our service: username (for leaderboard participation), game statistics (scores, completion times), and technical data (browser type, device information).
privacy_use_content: Your information is used solely to: provide game functionality, maintain leaderboards, improve user experience, and ensure service security. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties.
privacy_storage_content: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy_cookies_content: We use cookies and local storage to remember your preferences, game progress, and language settings. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect functionality.
privacy_rights_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights. You can also opt out of leaderboard participation by using visitor mode.
privacy_changes_content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify users of significant changes through our application or website.
privacy_contact_content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact page.

terms_accept_content: By accessing and using Killer Sudoku Score, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms_license_content: Permission is granted to temporarily use Killer Sudoku Score for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
terms_restrictions_content: You may not: modify or copy the materials, use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display, attempt to reverse engineer any software contained in the application.
terms_conduct_content: Users must not engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the service, including but not limited to: cheating, hacking, or attempting to manipulate game scores.
terms_privacy_content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service.
terms_modifications_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes through our application or website.
terms_termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever.
terms_contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our contact page.
cookie_intro_content: This Cookie Policy explains how Killer Sudoku Score uses cookies and local storage technologies to improve your experience.
cookie_what_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences and improve website functionality.
cookie_types_content: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. Functional Cookies: Remember your language settings, game progress, and user preferences. Analytics Cookies: Help us understand website usage and improve user experience.
cookie_storage_content: We use your browser's local storage to save your game progress, settings, and statistics so you can continue playing on your next visit.
cookie_manage_content: You can manage or delete cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
cookie_third_content: We may use third-party services (such as Google Analytics) to analyze website usage, and these services may set their own cookies.
cookie_contact_content: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us through our contact page.
